posts.caption: On November 4th, Californians will be voting on Proposition 50, a critical measure that aims to prevent politicians from manipulating election outcomes. By casting your vote, you're not just deciding the fate of your representative - you're deciding the future of democracy itself. Learn more about why voting yes on Prop 50 is essential for a fair and just electoral process.

Prop 50 aims to stop election rigging by preventing politicians from choosing their voters. This ballot initiative has critical implications for California and the entire country. By supporting Prop 50, you're helping to create a level playing field in the upcoming midterm elections.

Learn how the Obama Presidential Center will serve as a space for community engagement, education, and leadership development on the south side of Chicago. Hear from Michelle Obama about the center's mission to give back to the city that raised her and inspired her husband's leadership. Find out what's in store for this exciting new addition to the Chicago community, featuring a library, community garden, basketball court, recording studio, and more.

As the Obama Presidential Center prepares to open, Michelle and Barack Obama want to highlight the essential role small businesses play in Chicago's economy. This Small Business Saturday, we encourage you to shop local and support entrepreneurs who call this city home. Check out some of the local businesses featured in this post, like The Bee Love Cafe, Colibrí Cafe, and Melatte Coffee. Every purchase makes a difference in the community. #SmallBusinessSaturday #ShopLocal #ChicagoEconomy #SupportSmallBusiness #LocalEntrepreneurs #ChicagoFoodScene #SmallBusinessMatters #LocalLove #CommunityFirst

"Michelle and I believe in supporting the next generation of leaders who are working to make a difference in their communities. 

If you’re between the ages of 24 and 45, apply to join the @ObamaFoundation Leaders program, a global network of people committed to driving change. It’s an opportunity to sharpen your skills, increase your impact, and build lasting connections with people who share your passion for turning hope into action. 

Learn more about our Obama Leaders program at the link in our bios, and apply by December 12, 2025."

"At a time when our politics feels broken, we need leaders like @MikieSherrill for Governor.

Mikie will work to create jobs, lower costs, and do what’s right for the people of New Jersey. She has fresh ideas for how to make your life better, and the discipline to follow through. 

As governor, Mikie will deliver results. If you haven’t voted yet, today is the last day of early voting in New Jersey. And if you can’t vote early, make a plan to do it on Election Day on November 4th."

Fela Kuti: Fear No Man is a new podcast from @HigherGroundMedia that tells the story of a musical genius from Nigeria who made some music that I really love — combining funk, jazz, and soul into a whole new genre called Afrobeat. It’s a beautiful show about a unique figure in music history who mixed art with activism. I can’t wait for you to hear it. Check out Fela Kuti: Fear No Man right now on @Audible and wherever you get your podcasts.

"It was great being back in Norfolk, Virginia today to support @abigailspanberger for Governor. 

Abigail Spanberger cares about your freedoms, she will fight for your rights, and she will work every day to make your life a little bit better. 

She also knows how to get things done. As the mom of three kids in Virginia public schools, she cares about helping every child, and every teacher succeed. And as a Member of Congress, she’s stood up to politicians who are trying to increase costs and kick people off their healthcare. 

Virginia, don’t sit this election out. Make a plan to vote, and get your friends, family members, neighbors and coworkers to do the same. Because if we do, we will elect Abigail Spanberger as your next governor and put Virginia on the path to a brighter future."

In this candid conversation, Zariff, a seasoned barber, shares his thoughts on community development and life in Chicago. The shop owner discusses his 25-year-long friendship with President Obama and his experiences with stress management. Watch as the two chat about everything from the center opening to Michelle's garden and the importance of community centers.

The Obama Presidential Center is set to open in 2026, featuring a unique art installation of thousands of colorful tiles created by artist Spencer Finch. Each section represents a significant place in President Obama's life, including Honolulu, Nairobi, Jakarta, and Chicago. This engaging exhibit showcases the subjective nature of color and the power of visual experience.
